page.title: 12HOLME LACY HOUSE 3
page.content: { TRANSFER:}On 1st April 1974 it was transferred to the{Hereford & {Worcester County Council. { THE HEALTH AUTHORITY LEASE:}In 1979,the Council were told to give an early lease. Because they didn't want to keep the building,the old people were taken to{St.Mary's Hospital}in Hereford. After a lot of work to survey the house, it was decided to dispose of the property. { FINDING A NEW TENANT:}As the Council has no need for the house,the {Executors}were asked if the Council could put it on the market on a new long lease. To prepare the house for the market,the Council are carrying out extensive repairs. It was put on sale in the summer{1985,}with the intention of selling it by{1986.
